evidence.claim: Last Visit First utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, including serverless computing and storage.
The platform supports FHIR for health information exchange, ensuring compliance with healthcare standards.
HIPAA compliance is a key component of Last Visit First's data handling processes.
Real-time data processing capabilities are achieved through RESTful API integrations.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transaction handling or relevant integrations.
